related_post.text: @kutiekatj9 I want to see if I can put the simpledialog.askstring in the center of the window

so_post.text: @rubicminer Hmmm... I'm not really familiar with how to do that with tkinter. Mine usually defaults to a reasonable position but maybe this will help. <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40105197/pythontksimpledialogpositioningnexttotherootwindow>
